comments:
Description:
NPE when drag cube dimension from library to report
Build number:2.2.2.v20071029

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a libray with a valid cube.
2. New a report.
3. Use the library in report.
4. Drag dimension in library cube from library explorer to report Layout.

Expected result:
Forbidden this DND action.

Actual result:
NPE

Error log:
java.lang.NullPointerException

DimensionHandle from library view should not allowed to drag to layout editor directly.
Disable elements in Cube to be dragged in Library Explorer.
